entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 11. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Saturday 25 March 2023
